## JsPlumbInstance.unmanage() method

Stops managing the given element.  unmanage

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
unmanage(el: T["E"], removeElement?: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  el | T\["E"\] | Element, or ID of the element to stop managing. |
|  removeElement | boolean | If true, also remove the element from the renderer. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
